title: Errol Spence vs Shawn Porter fight live: Latest updates from welterweight unification bout
text:
Errol Spence meets Shawn Porter as the battle for welterweight supremacy takes its next big step.

Spence puts his IBF title on the line, while his opponents offers up his golden WBC strap at the Staples Centre this evening.

We have two world title fights on this evening, with the co-main event seeing Anthony Dirrell facing David Benavidez in a WBC super-middleweight bout. Follow our live coverage below for all the action.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

We're still quite a way from the main event, so why not give Jack Rathborn's piece a quick read? It's a good one. The search for ‘The Truth’ – Breaking down Spence vs Porter Hello and welcome to The Independent's live coverage of Errol Spence and Shawn Porter! The two welterweights meet in a unification bout which will see us get closer to finding out who the King of the division is. Keep with us for all the build up ahead of the main event.

What you need to know:

What time is the main event?

You can expect their ring walks any time between 3 and 4am UK time.

How can I watch the fight?

If you can’t attend like most of the fans watching worldwide, you’ll be able to find it on FOX pay-per-view if you’re in the US and on Sky Sports in the UK.
